tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ******** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** He takes out time to understand the problem and suggests the right treatment after diagnosing the issue. He has guided me during emergency condition as well during midnight which is appreciable. Thank you so much sir for your patience, guidance and motivating in right way. I would be forever thankful the way you provided your assistantance to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. A is absolutely terrific in how he explains the diagnosis based on your symptoms. He never stops asking questions which is rare to find in most doctors today. I came to him for my tonsils and sinus problem, and he ended up diagnosing a long-term issue all while explaining it while taking his time.  He also recommended me to a specialist to get a detailed look into my issues. 

He is one of the best doctors I have ever consulted. Forget value, he is one of those few doctors who will assure your doubts and ease them out.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This review was long due. I visited Dr. Anirudh last year after having high fever continously for 3 days. He recommended me few tests and ultimately I was diagnosed with Dengue. He took ample time to explain the problem, answered all our questions & suggested the right medicine. I was perfectly fine in 3 days which I felt was a miracle at that time. Recommend him a 100%

Dr. Anirudha is not only an amazing doctor but also a great human. Just by looking at my face he told me that I got dengue, which later turned out to be true in lab reports. I was not well when I visited him, hence he shared his personal number and was in regular touch with me. When my platelet count dropped significantly, he helped me to get admitted in a hospital, where he arranged everything for me through his contacts.

God bless you doctor, keep doing the amazing work.
Very nicely explained the report results and treament required.   I would like to recomend the doctor.
We visited after regular checkup for my mother. Dr Anirudha was very systematic n his approach . Checking all parameters, listening patiently and suggesting diet changes etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very understandable and kind. Very quick response. He listen my issues very carefully and suggested me very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is very calm and listens to patient very carefully and gives treatment precisely . I would recommend t  ok all my near ones

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Gives great advice and treatment but staff is slow . You  have to follow up multiple times to get your turn
